statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE overall_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, car_model FROM feedback_data WHERE performance_rating < 4;
SELECT feedback_text, overall_rating FROM feedback_data WHERE safety_rating = 5;
SELECT customer_name, design_rating, performance_rating, safety_rating FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY design_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data ORDER BY overall_rating DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, car_model FROM feedback_data WHERE safety_rating > 3 AND performance_rating < 5
SELECT customer_name, overall_rating, design_rating, performance_rating, safety_rating FROM feedback_data WHERE car_model = 'SUV' ORDER BY design_rating DESC
SELECT DISTINCT car_model FROM feedback_data WHERE overall_rating >= 4
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, overall_rating FROM feedback_data WHERE design_rating = 5 ORDER BY overall_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM car_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM car_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM car_features;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM car_feedback WHERE customer_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM car_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM car_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM car_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT feature_name FROM car_features WHERE feature_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY feature_name
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM car_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM car_features WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, car_model FROM customer_feedback WHERE car_model = 'Sedan';
SELECT designer_id, decision_description FROM design_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM car_features WHERE car_model = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, car_model, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feature_name, description FROM car_features WHERE car_model = 'Sedan' ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT designer_id, decision_description FROM design_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, car_model, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE car_model LIKE '%Sport%' AND feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT customer_id, car_model FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, model_name FROM car_models ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT feature_name, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rating_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, car_model, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedbacks;
SELECT f.customer_id, c.name, f.comments FROM feedbacks f JOIN customers c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT cm.model_name, cm.manufacturer, r.feature_name, r.rating_value FROM car_models cm JOIN ratings r ON cm.car_id = r.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, car_model FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM CarFeatures WHERE feature_category = 'Safety';
SELECT car_name, manufacturer, year_model FROM CarModels ORDER BY year_model DESC;
SELECT rating_id, feedback_id, feature_id, rating_value FROM CustomerRatings WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, car_model, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feature_name, feature_category, description FROM CarFeatures WHERE feature_category = 'Safety';
SELECT car_name, manufacturer, year_model FROM CarModels ORDER BY year_model DESC;
SELECT cr.rating_id, cf.feedback_id, cf.car_model, cr.rating_value FROM CustomerRatings cr INNER JOIN CustomerFeedback cf ON cr.feedback_id = cf.feedback_id WHERE cr.rating_value > 3;
